channel.title: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!
channel.description:
ive added a tut and changed it to make it better but when people make accounts it says this in moreinfo [code]character-lessionStart =false[/code] instead of a space between it, then when i have this code added to it [code]lessionStart = true;[/code] it dosnt change the file because its like that not with the space
can anyone help?
ive tried making it an int to change it to = 0 and = 1 but that makes no difference
thanks

item.title: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

umm

what i mean is

when the person types a command it should write into their file saying that they have done it, as in pimp where you type ::rules to move, but on mine it makes you go to school to learn basics of server and when they finish it should change the moreinfo file into

lession-started = true

or w.e but it dosnt so everytime you log in you have to go through the whole 2 mins of clicking for it :s

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!

item.title: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

That would mean that he hasn’t had the easter egg yet. I think. I don’t understand you.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!

item.title: Help me with my boolean writing moreinfo please!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Slivion, post:2, topic:111453”]It’s just how it’s been told to write that. You can change it i think in your client. Try searching for.

character-lessionStart

i mean it works and stuff but on like the easter bunny on basic pimp you know it writes the file so you can only get the basket once, on here it wont write it

this is the code for the tokens

} else if (token.equals("character-lessionStart")) { lessionStart = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2); (under loadmoreinfo)

characterfile.write("character-lessionStart = ", 0, 24); characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(lessionStart), 0, Boolean.toString(lessionStart).length()); characterfile.newLine();
for boolean savemoreinfo

but it wont work that well, because it does that thing i said instead of it writing in the file character-lessionStart = false

it will write

character-lessionStart =false

Read full topic
